actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To clarify the tariff classification of certain organo-phosphorous compounds and preparations thereof.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the provision of duties on: (1) n-(phosphonomethyl) glycine, including preparations containing such compound; (2) phosphonomethyliminodiacetic acid; and (3) aminomethane phosphonic acid and their salts and esters.

titles.title: To clarify the tariff classification of certain organo-phosphorous compounds and preparations thereof.
